much of it is rotten\par
-- much many\par
-- most \par

\f0\lang1033 so as \\ so as to \\ so as not - \f1\lang1049\'f2\'e0\'ea\'e8\'ec \'ee\'e1\'f0\'e0\'e7\'ee\'ec\f0\lang1033  \\ so that\f1\lang1049\par

\par
what should we think about when choosing our entertainment?\f1\lang1049\par

WorkText:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1251\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1049{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset204 Roboto Condensed;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Roboto Condensed;}}

\pard\cf1\f0\fs24 imagine, you are going to eat a piece of an apple. But you notice that it has a damage. What would you do? \par
\par
Imagine \f1\lang1033 that \f0\lang1049 you are about to bite\f1\lang1033  into\f0\lang1049  a piece of fruit when you notiice that a part of it is rotten. What will you do? Will you eat it anyway? Will you throw it away? Or will you cut out the rotten part and eat the good part?\par
\par
>>> 02-03-2021 14:57\par
\f1\lang1033 <I forgot about my idea of making certain number of sentences per week.>\f0\lang1049\par
\f1\lang1033 much of it is rotten\par
1. I love youtube videos, but much of them are not useful. (are useless)\par
many of them (\f0\lang1049\'ec\'ed\'ee\'e3\'e8\'e5\f1\lang1033 )\f0\lang1049  \f1\lang1033 much of them (\f0\lang1049\'e1\'ee\'eb\'fc\'f8\'e8\'ed\'f1\'f2\'e2\'ee\f1\lang1033 )\par
2. Fishing was nice, but much of fishes I caught were small.\par
The fishing was good, but most of the fish caught were shallow.\par
\f0\lang1049 3. \par
\par
the wall goes to the ceiling.\f1\lang1033\par
m: \f0\lang1049 We should put this thing there so as not to allow him to leave.\par
\f1\lang1033 there = some place, location / "on his way"\par
this thing = object, description / "red tree"\par
We should put the red tree on (in) his way so as not to allow him to leave us.\f0\lang1049\par
\f1\lang1033 t: \f0\lang1049 I gotta put this thing in here to keep it from going away\f1\lang1033 .\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\par
\f0\lang1049\par

TxtContent:
### Bible stady, chapter 6
p 1, 2

На этой неделе я постоянно применяю эти куски и стараюсь выражать их.

to be about to do (You are about to bite fruit)
bite into - откусить
it is rotten - подгнившее
the rotten part - гнилая часть
in some ways - в какой то степени
avoiding the bad and enjoying the good.
much of it is rotten
-- much many
-- most 
shallow - мелкий
it is violent - это жестоко
потолок - ceiling
so as \ so as to \ so as not - таким образом \ so that
cut out - отрезать
it is similar to that
same as 

what should we think about when choosing our entertainment?
we want to choose well.
